headline: Why Analysts Think Assurant Could Be Undervalued As Its Narrative Quietly Shifts
summary: Assurant's latest price target update leaves its fair value estimate steady at roughly $253.67 per share, even as subtle shifts in growth and risk assumptions reflect a more nuanced market narrative. Street research has grown more constructive, with higher targets in the mid $240s underscoring stronger confidence in the durability of earnings despite a softer backdrop for property and casualty. As this evolving view continues to influence expectations, investors will want to follow how these...
